item.title: Fried cauliflower
item.description: Ingredients 2 L peanut oil 1/2 cup cornstarch 1/2 cup all purpose flour 1/2 teaspoon baking powder Kosher salt 1/2 cup water 1/2 cup vodka 1 head cauliflower, cut into 1-inch florets 1/3 cup hot sauce, such as Frank’s 1 medium clove garlic, minced 1/4 cup picked celery leaves (optional) Instructions Preheat oil to 350°F in a large wok, Dutch oven, or deep fryer. Combine cornstarch, flour, baking powder, and 2 teaspoons kosher salt in a large bowl and whisk until homogeneous.
